<style>
  .paper-form {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    border: 1px solid #1b1c1d;
  }
  .paper-form > .section-title {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .paper-form > .paper-form {
    padding: 0;
    border: none;
  }
  .paper-form > section,
  .paper-form > div {
    position: relative;
    flex: 1 1 100%;
    border: 1px solid #1b1c1d;
    padding: 0.125rem 0.25rem;

    max-width: 100%;
    break-inside: avoid;

  .paper-form > section.inline-group > section.col4,

  }
  .paper-form > section.inline-group > section.col3p,

  .paper-form > section[data-tooltip]:before,
  .paper-form > div[data-tooltip]:before {
    content: attr(data-tooltip);
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: calc(100% - 1rem);
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.625rem;
    background-color: #1474e5;
    color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 0.125rem 0.125rem 0 0;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 -2px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
  }
  .paper-form > section[data-tooltip]:focus-within:before,
  .paper-form > div[data-tooltip]:focus-within:before {
    opacity: 1;
    bottom: 100%;
  }
  .paper-form .inline-group,
  .paper-form .form-group,
  .paper-form .radio,
  .paper-form .checkbox {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .paper-form .inline-group label,
  .paper-form .form-group label,
  .paper-form .radio label,
  .paper-form .checkbox label {
    line-height: 1.2;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #1b1c1d;
    word-break: break-word;
  }
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field,
  .paper-form .radio.inline-field,
  .paper-form .checkbox.inline-field {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field label.field-label,
  .paper-form .radio.inline-field label.field-label,
  .paper-form .checkbox.inline-field label.field-label {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    width: auto;
    margin-right: 1rem;
    line-height: calc(0.875rem * 1.5 + 0.5rem);
  }
  .paper-form .form-group label.field-label:empty, .paper-form .form-group label.field-label.hide-label,
  .paper-form .radio label.field-label:empty,
  .paper-form .radio label.field-label.hide-label,
  .paper-form .checkbox label.field-label:empty,
  .paper-form .checkbox label.field-label.hide-label {
    display: none;
  }
  .paper-form .form-group label.field-label em,
  .paper-form .radio label.field-label em,
  .paper-form .checkbox label.field-label em {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    margin-left: 0.25rem;
  }
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field .form-control,
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field .form-control-plaintext,
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=text],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=password],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=color],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=date],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=datetime-local],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=email],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=month],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=number],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=search],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=tel],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=time],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=url],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field input[type=week],
  .paper-form .form-group.inline-field select {
    width: auto;
  }
  .paper-form .radio label:not(.field-label),
  .paper-form .checkbox label:not(.field-label) {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    line-height: 1.5;
    margin-top: 0.25rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }
  .paper-form .radio label:not(.field-label) input,
  .paper-form .checkbox label:not(.field-label) input {
    margin-right: 0.625rem;
  }
  .paper-form .radio label.field-label:empty + label:last-child,
  .paper-form .checkbox label.field-label:empty + label:last-child {
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  .paper-form .form-control,
  .paper-form .form-control-plaintext,
  .paper-form input[type=text],
  .paper-form input[type=password],
  .paper-form input[type=color],
  .paper-form input[type=date],
  .paper-form input[type=datetime-local],
  .paper-form input[type=email],
  .paper-form input[type=month],
  .paper-form input[type=number],
  .paper-form input[type=search],
  .paper-form input[type=tel],
  .paper-form input[type=time],
  .paper-form input[type=url],
  .paper-form input[type=week],
  .paper-form select,
  .paper-form textarea {
    border-radius: 0;
    border-color: #d4d5d6;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    line-height: 1.5;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
    height: calc(0.875rem * 1.5 + 0.5rem);
    color: #4f5051;
  }
  .paper-form textarea,
  .paper-form textarea:not(.form-control) {
    height: auto;
  }
  .paper-form .form-control-plaintext {
    height: auto;
    border: 1px solid #d4d5d6;
    background-color: white;
    min-height: calc(0.875rem * 1.5 + 0.5rem);
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
  }
  .paper-form p {
    margin: 0;
  }
  .paper-form .font-xl {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
  }
  .paper-form .font-lg {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
  .paper-form .font-md {
    font-size: 0.875rem;
  }
  .paper-form .font-sm {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
  }
  .paper-form .strong {
    font-weight: 700;
  }
</style>
description: Use this form to request system access.
name: DD 2875 - SAAR

elements.name: Privacy Act Statement
elements.text:
PRIVACY ACT STATEMENT
AUTHORITY: Executive Order 10450, 9397; and Public Law 99-474, the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act.
PRINCIPAL PURPOSE: To record names, signatures, and other identifiers for the purpose of validating the trustworthiness of individuals requesting access to Department of Defense (DoD) systems and information. NOTE: Records may be maintained in both electronic and/or paper form.
ROUTINE USES: None.
DISCLOSURE: Disclosure of this information is voluntary; however, failure to provide the requested information may impede, delay or prevent further processing of this request.

elements.name: Part 1
elements.text: PART I (To be completed by Requestor)

renderAttributes.data-tooltip: The last name, first name and middle initial of the user.
The user's current organization (i.e. DISA, SDI, DoD and government agency or commercial firm).
The office symbol within the current organization (i.e. SDI).
The Defense Switching Network (DSN) phone number of the user. If DSN is unavailable, indicate commercial number.
The civilian job title (Example: Systems Analyst, GS-14, Pay Clerk, GS-5)/military rank (COL, United States Army, CMSgt, USAF) or "CONT" if user is a contractor.

renderAttributes.data-help-text: (Complete as required for user or functional level access.)
renderAttributes.data-tooltip: User must indicate if he/she has completed the Annual Information Awareness Training and the date.

elements.name: IA Training and Awareness Label
elements.text: 10. IA TRAINING AND AWARENESS CERTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS

elements.name: 10 IA TRAINING AND AWARENESS CERTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS

choices.label: I have completed Annual Information Awareness Training.

renderAttributes.data-tooltip: The date that the user signs the form.

elements.name: Footer Notice
elements.text: DD FORM 2875, AUG 2009 PREVIOUS EDITION IS OBSOLETE.

events.name: Add User Signature Widget
Render Review Parts
Add Help Text
